name: file-matcher
description: Return list of files, matching by file attributes or/and contents

scripts.build:
npm run clean &&  npm run tslint && tsc && npm run cp-package && npm run cp-md && echo '
===> End of Build process'
scripts.test:
mkdir -p ./test/sandbox/c && npm run build && echo '
===> Testing... ' && jasmine ./build/file-matcher/test/**/*.spec.js
scripts.coverage: nyc --reporter=json npm test && mv coverage/coverage-final.json coverage/coverage.json && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.json -o coverage/coverage.json && istanbul report lcov && istanbul report text
scripts.travis: npm run coverage && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
